Uses of Interface
com.gmail.woodyc40.commons.reflection.chain.ConstructLink

  • Packages that use ConstructLink 
    Package Description
    com.gmail.woodyc40.commons.reflection.chain
    Reflection chaining is multiple reflective operations dependant on the result of the last in order to get the final result.

    • Uses of ConstructLink in com.gmail.woodyc40.commons.reflection.chain

      Classes in com.gmail.woodyc40.commons.reflection.chain that implement ConstructLink 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ConstructLinkImpl
      Implementation for ConstructLink.
      Methods in com.gmail.woodyc40.commons.reflection.chain that return ConstructLink 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ConstructLink ReflectionChain.construct()
      Generates a new constructor accessor that provides access for construction for reflection based on this chain
      ConstructLink ConstructLink.construct(Class... params)
      Sets the constructor accessor based on the parameters provided
      ConstructLink ConstructLinkImpl.construct(Class... params) 
      ConstructLink ReflectionChain.construct(Class<?> base)
      Custom constructor accessor that doesn't depend on the base class from the chain constructor
      ConstructLink ConstructLink.constructFuzzy(int params, int index)
      Sets the constructor accessor by index picking off of the constructor that have the provided parameter count
      ConstructLink ConstructLinkImpl.constructFuzzy(int params, int index) 
      ConstructLink ConstructLink.last(int index)
      Uses the class value of a previous reflective operation to use as params to construction.
      ConstructLink ConstructLinkImpl.last(int index) 
      ConstructLink ConstructLink.param(Object... obj)
      Appends the provided parameters.
      ConstructLink ConstructLinkImpl.param(Object... obj)
